title: Monorepo
subtext: A single repository containing multiple distinct projects
author: TahaHameed23

description.title: Monolith
texts: A monorepo is a version-controlled repository that holds the code for multiple, often independent, projects within the same repository. Despite being housed together, these projects are developed and deployed separately.
Imagine a monorepo as a giant toolbox where all your tools are stored together in one place.
